bibl.title: The Economies of Hellenistic Societies, Third to First Centuries BC.
bibl.note: 19 papers from a conference held in the University of Copenhagen, 7-9 September 2006, and entitled "Demand Creation and Economic Flows". - Pp. 1-18: Z.H.A. and J.K.D., Introduction; - 441-444: V.G., Afterword; - 445-454: Index of Sources; - 455-460: General Index.
bibl.seg: ARCHIBALD Zosia H., John K. DAVIES and Vincent GABRIELSEN (Edd.), The Economies of Hellenistic Societies, Third to First Centuries BC.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2011, 8°, xviii-460 pp., 2 cartes, 29 figg. ISBN 978-0-19-958792-6. £85.

19 papers from a conference held in the University of Copenhagen, 7-9 September 2006, and entitled "Demand Creation and Economic Flows". - Pp. 1-18: Z.H.A. and J.K.D., Introduction; - 441-444: V.G., Afterword; - 445-454: Index of Sources; - 455-460: General Index.
